check_attribute_type(attribute, attribute_types)[source]¶

Check that attributes are coherent and present in the graph

Parameters:
  • attribute – a the input attribute to be checked
  • attribute_types – a type of enumerator that will be screened
Raises:

ValueError – if the attribute type is not of the selected enumerator
check_attributes_types(attributes_list: list, attribute_types)[source]¶

Check that attributes are coherent and present in the graph

Parameters:
  • attributes_list – a list of attributes asked to be reported
  • attribute_types – a type of enumerator or a list of enumerators that will be screened
Raises:

ValueError – if the attribute type is not of the selected enumerator

get_largest_component()[source]¶

Return the maximum component of a graph (a subrgraph of the original one)

Returns:a graph object with the only the largest component. If more than one component if present
Raises:MultipleSolutionserror – if there is more than one largest component
get_node_indices(node_names: list) → list[source]¶

Convert a list of names into a list of indices

Parameters:node_names – a list of strings containing all the node names
Returns:an index list containing the indices of the input node names

Parameters:index_list – a list of integers containing the index list
